name: MasterClass: Will Wright - Teaches Game Design and Theory
original_name: MasterClass: Will Wright - Teaches Game Design and Theory
overview: Learn the art and science of game design with Will Wright, the mind behind SimCity and The Sims. In this game design class, Will teaches you how to create games that empower players and unleash their imagination. You’ll develop a tool set for understanding player psychology, as well as learn Will’s approach to generating and pitching ideas, prototyping, playtesting, and building a community.
